org.joo.steak.framework.event

Interface StateChangedListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    StateEngineListener, StateManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStateManager, DefaultStateManager, StateChangedListenerDispatcherProxy

    public interface StateChangedListener
    A listener will receive StateChangedEvent When used for StateManager it will find the next state and move to that state.
    Author:
    griever

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onStateChanged(StateChangedEvent event)
      Called when the event is dispatched.

    • Method Detail

      • onStateChanged

        void onStateChanged(StateChangedEvent event)
        Called when the event is dispatched. Implementation should determine the next state using event.getAction()
        Parameters:
        event - the StateChangedEvent
